resources.string: After registration DINO will receive data from the Meter after 24-48 hours. You can connect it to the socket and configure it but wait 24-48 hours to check if it works.
Push shortly Button P1. All LEDs will flash together.
Select the "FLIGHT MODE" on your smartphone.

After that click "GO ON".
Select the WIFI Network on the drop-down box.
Type the network password.
Select DHCP.
Click SALVA.
Now DINO will automatically restart.\nIt will be ready in a minute.
